characters: Man in floral shirt, woman with umbrella, man on scooter
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A man in a floral shirt suddenly appears from the left side and crosses the road, followed by a woman with an umbrella. A man on a scooter is parked on the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a slow speed to avoid collision with the pedestrians crossing the road. The vehicles speed is gradually decreasing as it approaches the pedestrians.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A man in a floral shirt, approximately 2 meters away, crossing the road suddenly. 2) Right side: A woman with an umbrella, approximately 3 meters away, crossing the road. 3) Right side: A man on a scooter, approximately 5 meters away, parked and stationary.
